name: Hotel Reaper
description:
CONTROLS

A,D - movement

SPACE - jump

LEFT CLICK - attack (only when near your victim)

S - skip the opening cutscene, make the lift faster

Hello everyone, and welcome to HOTEL REAPER, a game about DECAYing residents of a hotel. The point of the game is to DECAY as many humans before touching the spikes, because if you touch the spikes, you DECAY. 

This game is my submission for the ScoreSpace x Ultimate Arcade game jam, with the theme of  DECAY.

All of the art, music, sounds and programming were made by myself.

I sincerely hope you will get amused.

-Enigmagical
